Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: cedric
Reviews.Content: Update bricked the phone but it was in perfect condition upon arrival I love this phone .... not many people have one so its really special I don't like being like everyone else .... had to pay for a replacement thru sprint but I still have my echo :-)

Reviews.Title: Echo
Reviews.Author: SirBossMan
Reviews.Content: this echo phone is pretty decent it works fine too me for those who have problems with it its probably not the phone just the user lol im just saying

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: A. JOYA "Adee D"
Reviews.Content: Bought this used & it was well worth it. I use it mainly for video viewing and reading PDF files, books, & documents!

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: robin
Reviews.Content: The product is different and fun. However, the phone cuts off. I guess its updating. This is a bit annoying.

Reviews.Title: this phone sucks
Reviews.Author: terence
Reviews.Content: I'm sorry but this phone is horrible apps always force closing poor battery life really slow I don't recommended this phone ladies and gentlemen!

Reviews.Title: broken
Reviews.Author: feduccino
Reviews.Content: Phone did not work! I didnt notice it till i recived a phone call and could not hear anything. Not even the sprint tech could repair it #mad

Reviews.Title: not too bad
Reviews.Author: tammy pittman
Reviews.Content: I have had the echo for a few days now, it has good battery life, it functions like I expected and overall it is a great phone. I did, however, have a problem with the charger that came with it, it didn't work. luckily I had a charger that fit it and worked. it also came in 2 days, a day before the estimated shipping date, so that's  a plus

Reviews.Title: Kyocera Echo
Reviews.Author: Kim Barnes
Reviews.Content: This was a boomerang product for me due to this phone is hard to get service for. The phone itself was nice. My son loved the features. But it is really expensive to put service on if you do not want a contract. It has no SIM card slot, so you are limited on which carriers will add service to it for a low price. Cheapest I found was for about $45-$55 a month, which is just like getting a contract. My son just didn't want to pay that much for a phone no matter how nice the phone was.However he did like the way the phone looked in tablet mode. It is a little on the heavy side, but the features are nice when watching a video or simultaneously wanting to text and be on facebook at the same time. I encourage you to get it if you like a lot of screen, but shop around for a good price on service for it.

Reviews.Title: Fairly "meh" overall.
Reviews.Author: Brian Mattison "Technophile"
Reviews.Content: The battery life is the most detracting factor about this phone. When you use a single screen, it's livable, but if you plan on using two screens, spend more and a get with a larger, more modern LCD panel. I find myself avoiding using two screens, because it just drains the battery too fast. The DPI on the screens is fine. If you buy into the whole "more pixels is better" thing, you'll be disappointed. If you're a normal user, you won't know the difference.The hinge is novel, and the phone is well built. However, it feels gimmicky after a while. It is fun to play with it, though.Camera is passable. It isn't great, but it does a decent job with enough light. Typically photos end up a little blown out.Android is close to stock. It runs gingerbread after the updates are complete. It isn't great, I very much prefer WP7/8 or iOS over this particular OS.The processor is getting a little old at this point. It's fast enough for most things, but it stutters at times. The graphics processor is strained when using two screens, and transitions/effects show that aspect.Overall this phone is "ok". I got it for a good price (I had to purchase a new battery) so I can't complain. I would suggest, however, that you buy another phone. This phone isn't worth owning anymore, especially with superior phones (in nearly every aspect) in the $200 or so range.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Aaron Moore
Reviews.Content: This item is great, perfect.It is exactly how it was depicted.It is exactly what I wanted.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: I guess I got lucky!!!
Reviews.Author: Mr.G
Reviews.Content: Like the title says, I guess I was the one of the lucky ones because I don't have all the complaints everyone else has. I've had this phone for about 2 1/2 years and I love it. I'm a 32 yr old man who still plays games on his phone and downloads random apps. I make phone calls and text all day long. I never use the 2 screen feature but even without that the phone works fine. The battery life could be better and the phone does cut off by itself every now and then but by every now and then I mean maybe once every few months. Complaints about storage...what are you people downloading??? I download apps all the time and don't really have a big problem with storage. If that's a problem you should start downloading to your SD card or get an SD card with more memory. Durability...i'm the guy that puts his phone in his lap while driving and then gets out of the car and it falls on the ground. My phone has never broken or fallen apart. Complaints about apps closing... it happens sometimes but not enough to complain about. My GPS works fine and as far as customer support.. I'd go to a sprint store if you can. My phone was stolen a while back...got a new one a day later. The phone is very easy to use and it has enough features to satisfy most people. But again looking at the other reviews it seems like people are in search of a perfect phone that has no issues. I doubt you'll find it. I've come to realize that phones are like temperatures...There isn't 1 that satisfies everyone!I also think it's funny when people complain about a phone and how it's slow with the internet or it's picture is not clear when watching tv or movies...It's a PHONE!!! If you want a cell phone that does cell phone things I can't say too many bad things about this one. If you want something that talks to you, searches the internet in milliseconds, looks perfect when watching tv on it, and never has any problems...good luck finding that.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is by far the worst phone, worst company and worst customer service that I have every received.  I purchased this phone for Christmas for my 13 year old daughter.  Within 2 weeks, it stopped working.  The battery would get very hot.  The touchscreen would not respond.  I spent over 5 hours on the phone with Kyocera technical support before they finally created an RMA to have it repaired.  They have now had the phone for 7 weeks and have no estimated time of completion on the repair.  The technical support technicians have no idea of what is happening and are not able to do anything to fix the phone.  They will not send a replacement and expect me to continue paying the monthly service bill.I will never by a Kyocera product of any kind.  If and when the phone finally shows up, I am going to take my car and run over it again and again.

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: this phone is not what u want it breaks easy and it is not a good phone would not buy one again

Reviews.Title: Great new phone
Reviews.Author: Carla A. Purser "walk aholic"
Reviews.Content: My son was looking for a new android phone and had considered buying this one but the price was too high. So we checked on Amazon and they had an excellent price for this phone

Reviews.Title: really like the phone it is pretty neat
Reviews.Author: andrew
Reviews.Content: was better then i thought it would be good phone like it not had no problems with it want's i got i updated and everything

Reviews.Title: Crappy.
Reviews.Author: Kimmy
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for almost 2 years and I HATE IT. So slow and always crashes! Plus this is my second on that the ear speaker has gone out.

Reviews.Title: Old, slow buggy hardware...
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: The phone's hardware is old, the os is buggy and it's heavy and slow on Sprint's mediocre 3G Network.  Get a 4G instead!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: JustJay
Reviews.Content: It is the easiest phone to use.  I broke my first one - totally my fault.  I searched to find another one because I don't want to go without it.  I love this phone.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT WAIST YOUR MONEY OR YOUR TIME!
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: WORST PHONE EVER!!!! CONSTANTLY FORCLOSES ALL APPLICATIONS INCLUDING THE PHONE PART. TOOK ME 1 HR TO MAKE ONE PHONE CALL BC THE PHONE KEPT FORCLOSING. CONSTANTLY RESETS ITSELF AT LEAST OH I DONT KNOW A MILLION TIMES A DAY. I DONT EVEN USE BOTH SCREENS. OH AND THE GPS JUST CONSTANTLY SEARCHES FOR A SIGNAL! WORTHLESS.

Reviews.Title: Awful phone
Reviews.Author: Zondra
Reviews.Content: So, this phone is old, #1.  So expect it to be slower, to crash and not be able to hold as much data as the newer phones these days.  When I first ordered it, I requested and paid for NEXT DAY, however I did not get next day.  The phone arrived after Christmas - way late, so I did not give the seller a favorable review.  After that, they refunded my money for the extra shipping cost, but with some hassle.  Bottom line, they did return my money, however, I most likely will not buy anything from them again.  The quality of the phone was not their fault, though - it's just an old phone.

Reviews.Title: not what you think
Reviews.Author: Virginia Da Mota
Reviews.Content: I have a Nokia 920 and my screen is almost as big as my screen. I was very disappointed I wouldn't recommend this phone to anyone

Reviews.Title: phone does not hold a charge and many other problems after just 2 months of use...what about the warranty?
Reviews.Author: Esther J. Jimenez
Reviews.Content: I chose 1 star because I bought this new phone for my daughter and after 2 months she has done nothing but complain about how the phone does not charge properly and it's always dieing on her.  She also has other problems with it.  It's been difficult trying to find out the warranty on this phone from the amazon site and the Phone etc page.

Reviews.Title: Lacks features
Reviews.Author: Michelle M. Arnold
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my son.  He seems to enjoy it though he says it lacks some features.  I apologize as I do not recall what his complaint was.

Reviews.Title: its cool
Reviews.Author: Dustin Lapp
Reviews.Content: i wanna get this phone, its so cool, done research this is a perfect for me. Its awesome. I wanna buy it.

Reviews.Title: it is gsm?
Reviews.Author: dunia R.V
Reviews.Content: this cell phone is GSM?? I live in Costa Rica and i want it but in the technical details just say 3g... so i wanna know.

ProductInfo.Features:
3G data speeds (EVDO Rev A.); Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g); Bluetooth connectivity (version 2.1)
Powered by the Android 2.2 operating system; 1 GHz Snapdragon processor; GPS using Sprint Navigation
4.3-inch capacitive display; Apps customized for Echo dual screen; Google mobile services
5-megapixel auto-focus camera; HD-quality video (720p); Media Player
Memory expansion via microSD card slot; Adobe Flash; Full HTML Web browser
ProductInfo.Name: Kyocera Echo Sprint Smartphone with Dual Touchscreens, Android 2.2, 5MP Camera, HD Video, Wi-Fi and GPS - Black
